import React from 'react' import '../../cssHelper/helper.css' import './Products.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; function Products() { const products = useSelector((state) => state.cart.products); const deleteProduct = async (itemId) => { await fetch('http://localhost/delete-products', { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', "Content-Type": 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ id: itemId }) .then((result) => result.json()) }) } return (

List of products

{ products.length > 0 ? ( products.map((product, index) => (

{product.id}

{product.name}

{product.category}

{product.price}.RS

)) ) : '' }
) } export default Products
